about_the_game:
Project Description:

In this expansive VR Military Simulation, Players will team up against unrelenting A.I. opponents to complete Objective-based Missions using Combined Arms assets on land, in the sea, and the skies above.

Develop your expertise in many different and challenging roles, and use your specialized skills to help your coalition achieve the mission objective! "Team-work makes the Dream work!

Mission objections include

Naval Combat: ASW/ASuW (Anti Surface Warfare/ Anti Sub Warfare)
CAS Close Air Support via AC-130U/A-10Warthog/EA-6B Prowler
CAP Combat Air Patrol F-14D Tomcat
Multirole Air-Support C-130U/UH-60
Ground Support M1-A2 Abrams/HUMVEE

And many more...

Kindly note that it will start in Beta stage, where most vehicles will be in rudimentary functionality and hopefully with time it will get further development.

This sim is being build by a single developer, I apologize for any bugs or inconvenience and would appreciate your patience and support.
